briefTitle: Long-term Safety Study of MP-513 as Monotherapy or in Combination With Sulfonylurea in Japanese Type 2 Diabetic Patients
officialTitle: Long-term Safety Study of MP-513 as Monotherapy or in Combination With Sulfonylurea in Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of MP-513 (Teneligliptin) as monotherapy or in combination with Sulfonylurea (glimepiride) in Japanese patients with type 2 Diabetes for 52 weeks administration.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
